question: Zojila tunnel, that was seen in news recently, connects Jammu and Kashmir with which state/UT?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi had laid the foundation stone for Zojila tunnel project in 2018, as the Asiaâ€™s longest bi-directional tunnel.
The project with estimated cost of Rs 4,509 crore, aims to provide all-year connectivity between Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh region. Recently, Megha Engineering and Infrastructure is set to construct the Zojila pass tunnel. The project is expected to completed in six years.
